queHice: Defined the brand identity and design language; created a scalable component system in Figma based on Atomic Design. Ran 6 feedback cycles with 4 admin reviewers; iterated IA, navigation, and card systems for projects and member stories. Wrote UI guidelines (spacing, typography, component states) and accessibility checks to ensure clarity and trust.

End-to-end design in ~3 hours: logo, brand palette, typography scale, and UX writing for professor and student voices. Prototyped the syllabus → room → insight IA; produced lightweight flows in Figma to guide development. Balanced clarity and speed (no full atomic system, hackathon-optimized).

Created the brand identity (logo, palette, typography) and campaign collateral (posters, social posts, box signage). Designed a lightweight Atomic Design kit in Figma (for web + print) to keep assets consistent across drives and events.

Figma system (Atomic Design): components for result cards, class chips, upload flows, and “How it works” diagram. Design Thinking: guided by two dermatologists—3 interviews, insight synthesis, and iteration cycles; explicit medical disclaimer language. Authored two explainer videos to communicate the UX and the pipeline to non-technical judges and stakeholders.
Atomic Design in Figma: tokens, components (cards, chips, wheels), and motion cues for the roulette. Produced end-to-end user flows; branding and tone to inspire, not intimidate

Created the brand, minimalist visual system, and copy tone for an “anyone can” feel. Designed the four-step flow to optimize for zero-learning-curve completion. Prototyped the bubble weighting interaction (Step 4) to make prioritization visual and tactile.

Designed a minimal, single-path UX in Figma: large drop-zone, three-step progress header, and preview with clear CTAs. Established visual language (contrast, spacing, hit-areas) optimized for quick comprehension in live demos. Mapped states (loading/empty/error/success) and microcopy to guide first-time users.

Ran Design Thinking end-to-end: discovery, synthesis (personas/empathy maps), ideation, prototyping, validation. Mapped IA and core gameplay loop; designed onboarding, session flow, rewards, and progress cues. Built a hi-fi Figma prototype with component variants and tokens; prepared a handoff packet (flows, specs, copy).
Created an Atomic Design system in Figma and mapped flows (dashboard, build, send, report). Aligned catalogs (skills→criteria→indicators→questions) with screen patterns for consistency.
